QuestData.Title: Into Zul'Farrak
QuestData.Description: That foul traitor...I should've known better than to trust his kind. My hunt for Sul'thraze has blinded me.$B$BForgive me, $n. Mazoga has fled inside of Zul'Farrak, the heart of the Sandfury civilization.$B$BIf you truly seek the sword, you must pursue him. Do not go alone; the entirety of the Sandfury tribe lies in wait behind those walls, and they will not welcome you.$B$BI will stay here. My search for the blade must end. Should you find it, keep it; I must give up before I am consumed.
